column1: Happy Thanksgiving from my home to yours. Although this holiday may be spent differently I hope your day is filled with delicious food and time to reflect on our blessings.

This November we celebrate the thousands of adoptive families that strengthen our communities and give children an opportunity to succeed. Read President Trump’s proclamation for #NationalAdoptionMonth and what the administration is doing to help: https://t.co/BmfDuIwZnk

Thankful for President @realDonaldTrump for his action to protect the domestic supply of critical minerals including those found in Idaho. Relying on foreign adversaries like China for these crucial resources creates a natural security liability. More: https://t.co/aWsYID78gh https://t.co/dkA8yTrlap

The Nez Perce Tribe headquarted in Lapwai has more than 3500 citizens and the tribe is steadily one of the top three employers in North Idaho contributing millions of dollars to Idaho's economy. #NativeAmericanHistoryMonth

Idaho has over 1818 children in our foster care system. Many of those children are waiting on forever homes. Let's raise awareness for the 122000 kids in the US needing support on National Adoption Day! #natladoptionday #adoptiongives  Learn more: https://t.co/v9O0FyLLPJ

A new rule by the @DeptVetAffairs affirms that VA health care professionals can practice across state lines. As different areas experience shortages of healthcare workers it is critical that the care of our veterans is not compromised. Learn more: https://t.co/vnpldYO1Eq

I fully support the latest pilot program proposal by the Trump Administration which expands job opportunities in the trucking industry to young Americans. This is a critical industry to our COVID response. Read my letter here: https://t.co/3VByq9vQU0 https://t.co/temVfs5wiX

Congratulations to John Wagner on his appointment to lead @INL! @john_c_wagner has been a dedicated and passionate Director for Nuclear Science and Technology and I look forward to collaborating with him in this new position.

Idaho highschool students are encouraged to participate in CyberStart America an inventive online competition sponsored by the National Cyber Scholarship Foundation & supported by the Idaho National Library. Visit https://t.co/Wum58yD3kU. to explore the challenges.

Thank you @realDonaldTrump for continuously putting Americans first. Under his administration @CMSGov has released a broad plan to ensure all Americans will have access to the COVID-19 vaccine at no cost.   For more information visit: https://t.co/C1lV0gR6Vw

I applaud @DeptVetAffairs for partnering with Veterans Matter an organization that has helped more than 4000 Veterans find permanent housing since 2012. This collaboration will surely find new ways to cut through red tape to combat Veteran homelessness. https://t.co/L7J0g2UdOG

In 1994 the Kootenai Tribe began conservation & restoration efforts to recover the endangered Kootenai River white sturgeon and they continue to work with state & federal agencies to preserve native fish & wildlife.  #NativeAmericanHeritageMonth

In honor of #NativeAmericanHeritageMonth I want to highlight the federally recognized tribes in Idaho and feature key components of their culture. This month gives us the opportunity to celebrate the bold history of indigenous peoples and learn more about Idaho tribes.
I look forward to working with my new pro-life colleagues! https://t.co/B1zM5pBZno

I am proud and grateful to have two veterans serving in my D.C. office to offer insight into how proposed policies will impact our veterans.   Thank you to Legislative Analyst Steve Ackerman and Intern Jensen Thomas for your continued service to our state and nation! #VeteransDay

The @DeptVetAffairs has launched a campaign to promote the Veterans Legacy Memorial. Post tributes to loved ones who have served this country and preserve the memories of our country’s heroes. #VeteransDay  Learn more: https://t.co/sXVVPj8U1k

Congrats to IIS Treasure Valley Advanced Concepts & National Native American Construction for their HIRE Veterans Medallion Program awards! These companies are being recognized for their value and investment in hiring  Veterans.  #VeteransDay https://t.co/J8TZUVxEjq

Starting today the Trump Administration has granted Veterans & Gold Star Families free admission to all National Parks  & Wildlife Refuges. Veterans & their families can now enjoy unlimited access to 400 mil acres of public lands they fought to protect.   https://t.co/ALA0NvM7bo

I want to wish all veterans including the 120000 in Idaho a #HappyVeteransDay. We thank you for your valor and service to this country. I am honored to work for you in Congress and will continue to champion policies that protect your benefits care and rights. https://t.co/BrzLiau41Y
I am committed to taking the steps appropriate with this office that can ensure our election process is transparent legal and secure.   2/2

I join my constituents in deep concern about the disturbing interferences being exposed in this election. This is not a partisan issue; the integrity of our election process relies on these allegations being thoroughly investigated and rectified.  1/2

The UN should not be infringing upon pro-life laws and policies of sovereign member states. I support @USAID Administrator Barsa and the @realDonaldTrump Administration as they seek to protect life and defend religious liberty – at home and abroad. https://t.co/vob2z7DFUD

This weekend U.S. Special Forces successfully rescued an American citizen being held hostage in Nigeria. Congratulations to President @realDonaldTrump and our brave soldiers on a successful mission. https://t.co/WYnvQQHyxq

My approach has always been to find patient-centric alternatives to government-controlled health care. This is exactly the type of creative solution we need.  More information here: https://t.co/YpxLhfn3Xv  3/3

Pricing transparency along with recent actions to provide flexibility in federal rules encourages providers to lower the cost of healthcare and gives patients the information needed to compare health providers and treatment options.  2/3

Patients should know what a treatment costs before they go into the operating room.   This new rule by the @realDonaldTrump Administration will give patients transparent information on the price of medical care prescriptions and insurance cost-sharing.   1/3

One day left to vote for your favorite "Coolest Thing in Idaho!" There are 9 finalists in the running and the winner will be announced this Friday October 30th.  View the finalists and vote here: https://t.co/QehHMDN97w https://t.co/ctUaojn8oK

I applaud President @realDonaldTrump and his Administration for modernizing our permitting process and prioritizing the West’s critical carbon-free infrastructure. Read more about CEQ’s  announcement here:  https://t.co/oY9ijBOWcl

In a move that will expand economic opportunities in rural Idaho the Trump Administration announced that the USDA will be awarding $43.2 million in grants and loans to provide high-speed broadband service to underserved rural areas. Read more here: https://t.co/fWXRPkbqit https://t.co/LUUl8cEUMM

Congratulations to the new Schweitzer Career & Technical Education Center in Lewiston Idaho on your ribbon cutting ceremony this afternoon. This new facility will prepare students with skills and education needed for a lifetime of career success. https://t.co/kv9QosRMLs

Our office has been instrumental in returning over $2.5 Million back to constituents in Idaho’s First District. President Trump ceased the incoming flights from China when the COVID-19 pandemic began. Without a doubt @realDonaldTrump saved many American lives and is willing to stand up to China. Now it is time to get answers. https://t.co/YKTrxIfmPI

The @USDA @SecretarySonny's announcement of disaster designations in Oregon also includes portions of Idaho. These designations are due to drought intensity values in these areas.   Learn more about the declarations and counties impacted here: https://t.co/fPVViJdvVI

https://t.co/whXcoc1l6p

As we continue our recovery it’s important that we begin by making sure government doesn’t stand in the way of economic growth. That’s why I’m cosponsoring the BUILDER Act to modernize NEPA. Read more here: https://t.co/lbdqCa29ax https://t.co/TwZOHmL1cc

Idaho is home to more than 120000 veterans that deserve physical and mental care from qualified health care professionals. I am proud to vote YES on H.R. 3228 a bill that would expand the amount of employees available @DeptVetAffairs for TeleHealth care. https://t.co/vIzJPX461V

Our booming economy under the @realDonaldTrump Administration saw the unemployment rate dropping to 3.6% —the lowest  since December 1969.  Republicans are ready to renew the American Dream rebuild the economy and restore our nation's way of life. https://t.co/yIdRS070bd

US Department of Transportation has approved a BUILD grant to the Nez Perce Tribe of over $19 million to fund the Aht’Wy interchange project. This grant will improve one of Idaho’s most hazardous highway sections for local businesses and residents along Highway 95/12. https://t.co/nzSwH5SC6V

COVID-19 has placed a great strain on our federal budget. As we continue to battle the virus and begin our economic recovery we must be mindful that exploding budgets have dangerous consequences of their own. https://t.co/hL6uJYxSNX

I pledge to continue defending the inherent right to life for every unborn child and there is still work to be done. Heartbreaking policies still being defended by democrats include the 'born alive' practice which allows deadly-neglect of babies born alive after failed abortions. https://t.co/Yee9PcnCr9

Keep America Great!

Idaho has more than 120000 veterans -- about 10.4% of our adult population. Thank you to @realDonaldTrump for making veterans a priority during your Administration and providing the much needed reforms to the @DeptVetAffairs. https://t.co/fTCtZ2R13U

American innovation is at the forefront of formulating a vaccine in a matter of months instead of years. Operation #WarpSpeed is a perfect example of how the @realDonaldTrump Administration has brought together industry and government to protect our nation. https://t.co/fEJT5GhZ4G

The @USCBO 2020 Long-Term Budget Outlook is out and it projects the federal debt held by the public will be nearly double the size of the economy by 2050. We must get serious about deficit reduction so that future generations can fulfill the American Dream. https://t.co/CdubR3KweR

Veterans suicide rate is more than twice the general population. I voted YES on S. 785 to make education & grants a priority for suicide-prevention services at @DeptVetAffairs & to improve mental healthcare. The VA will now provide hearing aid services at every medical center.
